channel.description: Recent content in crypto on Sild's blog

item.title: Crypto introduction
item.description: Such a thing happened and I started a new job in the crypto domain knowing nothing about it. Here are a few links which make me more aware of what’s happening: DEX - what is it and what are its advantages compared to centralized exchanges The Open Network Architecture - an overview of the TON network architecture and ideas How to build your own blockchain - a step-by-step guide for building a simple blockchain.
